data.title: Past Female Guests
data.meta_description: Lately been missing some great past female guests: Becky Worley, Molly Wood, Xeni Jardin, Veronica Belmont, Natalie Morris (I know, she isn’t to much in tech anymore, plus she isn’t a liberal Democrat so I imagine no cha…
data.text:
Lately been missing some great past female guests: Becky Worley, Molly Wood, Xeni Jardin, Veronica Belmont, Natalie Morris (I know, she isn’t to much in tech anymore, plus she isn’t a liberal Democrat so I imagine no chance of her ever coming back) & Jolie O’Dell.

Just reminiscing, any others I missed?

I have followed this whole thing pretty closely, it never appeared that they did anything illegal (and I definitely don’t think it was intentional), however they definitely had partnered with the fellow in Indianapolis who did some underhanded things.

They had some real estate dealing in plenty of other areas that appeared to be very successful and had plenty of satisfied customers.They were helping investors buy up old, they would take care of getting them renovated and then getting them rented. After the whole thing in Indianapolis went down, they switched and started doing brand new builds in areas that have good rental markets (and in rental friendly states), I always assumed they did that because they got burned from the deal you are referring to.

He does real estate investing podcast, and they both do a news/political podcast as well that I enjoy listening to.

Kara Swisher was good value for money whenever she appeared on TWiT - her last appearance on the show was in 2017 (alongside Clayton Morris, coincidentally!)

And Amy Webb is always someone I learn much from when she appears. Always plenty of thoughtful insights! Her trio of appearances on Triangulation are worth listening to:
